doc.name: Ramp
doc.description: Produce an output token on each firing with a value that is incremented by the specified step each iteration. The first output is given by the init parameter, and the increment may be given either by the step parameter or by the associated step port. Note that the increment will show up in the output only on the next iteration. If you need it to show up on the current iteration, use the{
doc.author: Yuhong Xiong, Edward A. Lee
doc.property: The value produced by the ramp on its first iteration. If this value is changed during execution, then the new value will be the output on the next iteration. The default value of this parameter is the integer 0.
The amount by which the ramp output is incremented on each iteration. The default value of this parameter is the integer 1.
